00018 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbSelection { 
00019   public:
00020     enum { quantum = 1024 };
00021     class segment { 
00022       public:
00023         segment* prev;
00024         segment* next;
00025         size_t   nRows;
00026         oid_t    rows[quantum];
00027 
00028         segment(segment* after) { 
00029             prev = after;
00030             next = NULL;
00031             nRows = 0;
00032         }       
00033     };
00034     segment*  first;
00035     segment*  last;
00036     segment*  curr;
00037     size_t    nRows;
00038     size_t    pos;
00039 
00040     segment*  createNewSegment(segment* after);
00041 
00042     void add(oid_t oid) {
00043         if (last == NULL) { 
00044             first = last = createNewSegment(NULL);
00045         } else if (last->nRows == quantum) { 
00046             last = last->next = createNewSegment(last);
00047         }
00048         last->rows[last->nRows++] = oid;
00049         nRows += 1;
00050     }
00051    
00052     void sort(dbDatabase* db, dbOrderByNode* order);
00053     static int compare(oid_t a, oid_t b, dbOrderByNode* order);
00054 
00055     void toArray(oid_t* oids) const;
00056     void truncate(size_t from, size_t length);
00057 
00058     dbSelection() { 
00059         nRows = 0;
00060         pos = 0;
00061         first = curr = last = NULL;
00062     }
00063     void reverse();
00064     void reset();
00065 };
00066 
00067 enum dbCursorType { 
00068     dbCursorViewOnly,
00069     dbCursorForUpdate
00070 };

00075 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbAnyCursor : public dbL2List {

00091     int getNumberOfRecords() const { return (int)selection.nRows; }

00096     void remove();
00097     
00102     bool isEmpty() const { return currId == 0; }
00103 
00108     bool isUpdateCursor() const { 
00109         return type == dbCursorForUpdate;
00110     }
00111 
00116     bool isLimitReached() const { return selection.nRows >= limit || selection.nRows >= stmtLimitLen; }
00117

00137     int select(dbQuery& query, dbCursorType aType, void* paramStruct = NULL) {
00138         type = aType;
00139         reset();
00140         paramBase = paramStruct;
00141         db->select(this, query);
00142         paramBase = NULL;
00143         if (gotoFirst() && prefetch) { 
00144             fetch();
00145         }
00146         return (int)selection.nRows;
00147     } 
00148     
00155     int select(dbQuery& query, void* paramStruct = NULL) { 
00156         return select(query, defaultType, paramStruct);
00157     }
00158      
00166     int select(char const* condition, dbCursorType aType, void* paramStruct = NULL) { 
00167         dbQuery query(condition);
00168         return select(query, aType, paramStruct);
00169     }

00178         return select(condition, defaultType, paramStruct);

00186     int select(dbCursorType aType) { 
00187         type = aType;
00188         reset();
00189         db->select(this); 
00190         if (gotoFirst() && prefetch) { 
00191             fetch();
00192         }
00193         return (int)selection.nRows;
00194     }

00201         return select(defaultType);

00242     void update() { 
00243         if (type != dbCursorForUpdate) {
00244             db->handleError(dbDatabase::ReadonlyCursor);
00245         }
00246         if (currId == 0) {
00247             db->handleError(dbDatabase::NoCurrentRecord);
00248         }
00249         db->update(currId, table, record);
00250     }
00251 
00255     void removeAll() {
00256         assert(db != NULL);
00257         if (type != dbCursorForUpdate) {
00258             db->handleError(dbDatabase::ReadonlyCursor);
00259         }
00260         db->deleteTable(table);
00261         reset();
00262     }

00385     void fetch() { 
00386         if (db->currIndex[currId] & (dbInternalObjectMarker|dbFreeHandleMarker)) {
00387             db->handleError(dbDatabase::AccessToDeletedObject);
00388         }
00389         table->columns->fetchRecordFields(record, 
00390                                           (byte*)db->getRow(currId));
00391     }
00392 
00396     bool hasNext() const;
00397     
00398   protected: 
00399     dbDatabase*        db;
00400     dbTableDescriptor* table;
00401     dbCursorType       type;
00402     dbCursorType       defaultType;
00403     dbSelection        selection;
00404     bool               allRecords;
00405     oid_t              firstId;
00406     oid_t              lastId;
00407     oid_t              currId;
00408     byte*              record;
00409     size_t             limit;
00410 
00411     int4*              bitmap; // bitmap to avoid duplicates
00412     size_t             bitmapSize;
00413     bool               eliminateDuplicates;
00414     bool               checkForDuplicatedIsEnabled;
00415     bool               prefetch;
00416     bool               removed; // current record was removed
00417     bool               lastRecordWasDeleted; //last record was deleted
00418 
00419     size_t             stmtLimitStart;
00420     size_t             stmtLimitLen;
00421     size_t             nSkipped;
00422 
00423     void*              paramBase;
00424     
00425     void checkForDuplicates();
00426     void deallocateBitmap();
00427 
00428     bool isMarked(oid_t oid) { 
00429         return bitmap != NULL && (bitmap[oid >> 5] & (1 << (oid & 31))) != 0;
00430     }
00431 
00432     void setStatementLimit(dbQuery const& q) { 
00433         stmtLimitStart = q.stmtLimitStartPtr != NULL ? (nat4)*q.stmtLimitStartPtr : q.stmtLimitStart;
00434         stmtLimitLen = q.stmtLimitLenPtr != NULL ? (nat4)*q.stmtLimitLenPtr : q.stmtLimitLen;
00435     }
00436 
00437     void truncateSelection() { 
00438         selection.truncate(stmtLimitStart, stmtLimitLen);
00439     }
00440 
00441     void mark(oid_t oid) { 
00442         if (bitmap != NULL) { 
00443             bitmap[oid >> 5] |= 1 << (oid & 31);
00444         }
00445     }    
00446 
00447     bool add(oid_t oid) { 
00448         if (selection.nRows < limit && selection.nRows < stmtLimitLen) { 
00449             if (nSkipped < stmtLimitStart) { 
00450                 nSkipped += 1;
00451                 return true;
00452             }
00453             if (eliminateDuplicates) { 
00454                 if (bitmap[oid >> 5] & (1 << (oid & 31))) { 
00455                     return true;
00456                 }
00457                 bitmap[oid >> 5] |= 1 << (oid & 31);
00458             } 
00459             selection.add(oid);
00460             return selection.nRows < limit;
00461         } 
00462         return false;
00463     }
00464 
00465     byte* fetchNext();
00466     byte* fetchPrev();

00468     bool gotoNext();
00469     bool gotoPrev(); 
00470     bool gotoFirst();
00471     bool gotoLast();
00472     
00473     bool moveNext();
00474     bool movePrev();
00475 
00476     void setCurrent(dbAnyReference const& ref);
00477 
00478     void adjustReferences(size_t base, size_t size, size_t shift) { 
00479         if (currId != 0 && record != NULL) { 
00480             table->columns->adjustReferences(record, base, size, shift);
00481         }
00482     }
00483 
00484     dbAnyCursor(dbTableDescriptor& aTable, dbCursorType aType, byte* rec)
00485     : table(&aTable),type(aType),defaultType(aType),
00486       allRecords(false),currId(0),record(rec)
00487     {
00488         db = aTable.db;
00489         limit = dbDefaultSelectionLimit;
00490         prefetch = rec != NULL;
00491         removed = false;
00492         bitmap = NULL; 
00493         bitmapSize = 0;
00494         eliminateDuplicates = false;
00495         checkForDuplicatedIsEnabled = true;
00496         paramBase = NULL;
00497         stmtLimitLen = dbDefaultSelectionLimit;
00498         stmtLimitStart = 0;
00499         nSkipped = 0;
00500     }
00501   public:
00502     dbAnyCursor() 
00503     : table(NULL),type(dbCursorViewOnly),defaultType(dbCursorViewOnly),
00504           allRecords(false),currId(0),record(NULL)
00505     {
00506         limit = dbDefaultSelectionLimit;
00507         prefetch = false;
00508         removed = false;
00509         bitmap = NULL;
00510         bitmapSize = 0;
00511         eliminateDuplicates = false;
00512         checkForDuplicatedIsEnabled = true;
00513         db = NULL;
00514         paramBase = NULL;
00515         stmtLimitLen = dbDefaultSelectionLimit;
00516         stmtLimitStart = 0;
00517         nSkipped = 0;
00518     }
00519     ~dbAnyCursor();
00520 };

00526 template<class T>
00527 class dbCursor : public dbAnyCursor { 
00528   private:
00529     // It is not possible to copy cursors
00530     dbCursor<T> operator = (dbCursor<T> const& src) { 
00531         return *this;
00532     } 
00533     dbCursor(dbCursor<T> const& src) {assert(0);}
00534 
00535   protected:
00536     T record;
00537     
00538   public:
00543     dbCursor(dbCursorType type = dbCursorViewOnly) 
00544         : dbAnyCursor(T::dbDescriptor, type, (byte*)&record) {}
00545 
00552     dbCursor(dbDatabase* aDb, dbCursorType type = dbCursorViewOnly)
00553         : dbAnyCursor(T::dbDescriptor, type, (byte*)&record)
00554     {
00555         db = aDb;
00556         dbTableDescriptor* theTable = db->lookupTable(table);
00557         if (theTable != NULL) { 
00558             table = theTable;
00559         }
00560     }
00561 
00566     T* get() { 
00567         return currId == 0 ? (T*)NULL : &record; 
00568     }
00569     
00574     T* next() {
00575         return (T*)fetchNext();
00576     }
00577 
00582     T* prev() { 
00583         return (T*)fetchPrev();
00584     }
00585 
00590     T* first() { 
00591         if (gotoFirst()) {
00592             fetch();
00593             return &record;
00594         }
00595         return NULL;
00596     }
00597 
00602     T* last() { 
00603         if (gotoLast()) {
00604             fetch();
00605             return &record;
00606         }
00607         return NULL;
00608     }    
00609     
00615     int seek(dbReference<T> const& ref) { 
00616         return dbAnyCursor::seek(ref.getOid());
00617     }
00618 
00623     T* operator ->() { 
00624         if (currId == 0) {
00625             db->handleError(dbDatabase::NoCurrentRecord);
00626         }
00627         return &record;
00628     }
00629 
00635     T* at(dbReference<T> const& ref) { 
00636         setCurrent(ref);
00637         return &record;
00638     }
00639     
00644     void toArray(dbArray< dbReference<T> >& arr) const { 
00645         arr.resize(selection.nRows);
00646         toArrayOfOid((oid_t*)arr.base());
00647     }
00648 
00653     dbReference<T> currentId() const { 
00654         return dbReference<T>(currId);
00655     }
00656 
00661     bool isInSelection(dbReference<T>& ref) {
00662         return dbAnyCursor::isInSelection(ref.getOid());
00663     }
00664 };

00666 class dbParallelQueryContext { 
00667   public:
00668     dbDatabase* const      db;
00669     dbCompiledQuery* const query;
00670     oid_t                  firstRow;
00671     dbTable*               table;
00672     dbAnyCursor*           cursor;
00673     dbSelection            selection[dbMaxParallelSearchThreads];
00674 
00675     void search(int i); 
00676 
00677     dbParallelQueryContext(dbDatabase* aDb, dbTable* aTable, 
00678                            dbCompiledQuery* aQuery, dbAnyCursor* aCursor)
00679       : db(aDb), query(aQuery), firstRow(aTable->firstRow), table(aTable), cursor(aCursor) {}
00680 };
